{%- macro loadjs(name) -%} {%- assets '{}_js'.format(name) -%} {%- endassets -%} {%- endmacro %} {%- macro loadcss(name, media='screen') -%} {%- assets '{}_css'.format(name) -%} {%- endassets -%} {%- endmacro %} {% macro fmtdelta(timedelta) -%} {%- set hours=timedelta.seconds // (60 * 60) -%} {%- set minutes=(timedelta.seconds - 60 * hours) // 60 -%} {%- set seconds=timedelta.seconds % 60 -%} {%- if hours -%} {{ hours }}h {{ minutes }}m {% elif minutes -%} {{ minutes }}m {% endif -%} {{ seconds }}s {%- endmacro %}
